nodes.text: The Collected Writings of Master Dorak

The Collected Writings of Master Dorak was a collection of proverbs and texts written by the Jedi Master Dorak during his lifetime. It was included in a list of suggested texts for Jedi Padawans to peruse during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, three centuries after Dorak's death.

The Collected Writings were first mentioned in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, as a reference to Dorak's tendency to speak proverbs in the video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.
